main event: An electronics engineer reported seeing an unidentified flying object near Alamogordo, New Mexico on November 4, 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as egg-shaped and approximately 500 feet long., The engineer noticed that multiple automobiles were stopped as the object passed by., The sighting caused the engineer's car radio to fade and the engine to stall., The object appeared to have a shiny surface like mother of pearl., The engineer claimed to have suffered from a severe sunburn after the encounter.
witness description: an electronics engineer from the Air Force Missile Development Center
